column1: In the course of this study
column2: we will not collect any demographic data about you. We will only collect your responses in confidence-related surveys and your interaction with the system. These data will be stored in a secure and anonymized way.

column1: Participation in this study is voluntary and without compensation.
Your consent can be revoked at any point without stating a reason.

The participant ID above serves to pseudonymize your study responses in case you want to revoke your consent at any stage. If you want data collected about you in the course of this study to be deleted
column2: you can do this until March 31st
column4: by contacting maath.musleh@tuwien.ac.at and relaying your participant ID. Please write it down or memorize it. We will not be able to locate your data without it.

column1: We will store your data for up to 2 years after the completion of the study
column2: but only until the publication of the results.

column1: You have a right to appeal: In connection with the processing of your personal data
column7: and withdrawal. The right to information
column9: and restriction of processing may be restricted if such rights are likely to render impossible or seriously impair the achievement of the purposes according to Article 89 Sec 2 GDPR.

column1: You can contact the Data Protection Authority (Austrian Data Protection Authority (DSB)
column3: 1030 Vienna) if you believe that the processing of their data violated data protection law.
